body:
So Avicus has a new host (Peachy said it on skype) and we were all checking our pings. 

My ping went from 78 to 55.

The Host is now in New Jersey

Post the ping you had BEFORE and AFTER

replies.body:
There is now a new new host (Confirmed by Brit). Personally I hate it. I liked the second host more. 
Host 1 : 90-100 ms
Host 2 : 60 ms
Host 3 : 123 ms and constant time-outs. AND for some reason my ping decides to spike about 3 times a day to over 400. #NewNewHostWhyDoYouH8Me?


EDIT : THERE IS NO THIRD HOST. MY INTERNET HAS MERELY DECIDED TO BE A COMPLETE TURD SINCE WE SWITCHED BACK TO THE OLD HOST.
